text:
William "Will" Sasso (born May 24, 1975) is a Canadian actor and comedian. He is best known on television for his five seasons as a cast member on "MADtv" from 1997 until 2002 and for his role as Vince Goodson in the CBS program "$h*! My Dad Says" (2010–11). He also starred as Curly in the 2012 movie "The Three Stooges". In 2013, he started releasing Vine videos.
Sasso was born in Ladner, British Columbia. His parents are Italian immigrants.
